channel.title: AI on RiceJS
channel.description: Recent content in AI on RiceJS

item.title: Somnia: AI-Powered Dream Journal
item.description: Somnia: When Dreams Meet AI Ever wondered what your dreams actually mean? As a 27-year-old engineering student fascinated by the intersection of AI and human psychology, I built Somnia - a modern Flutter dream journal that uses AI to unlock the hidden patterns in your subconscious mind. This isn’t just another note-taking app. It’s a complete system that combines dream logging, AI-powered analysis, and freemium monetization into a polished mobile experience.

item.title: Lucid Logs - Dream Journal
item.description: The Power of Dreams I’m a chill young developer rising through the ranks, passionate about dreams and how they have shaped my life. I believe in the power of the subconscious - how our waking mind is just 20% of what makes us who we are. Dreams are powerful tools, recognized even from biblical days with Joseph and his coat of many colors, interpreting Pharaoh’s dreams. Why Lucid Logs? I wanted to build this app to help us connect with our subconscious more deeply, to understand what our dreams might be telling us.
